item.description:
CHANGE IN PLAN: If you already bought your $40 groupon lesson for Sunapee, save it for the next trip (we will go again soon!)

This coming week Jan 7 - 13th offers the free lessons, gear rental, and lower mountain lift tickets for beginners.  Many of us are beginners so I'm going to change the location to Ragged Mountain Resort.  You'll need to REGISTER ONLINE and Call up Ragged Mountain Resort ASAP to sign up for the Saturday's 10am lesson: 603.768.3600 x 3032

 

http://skinh.com/deals/learntoskiandsnowboardmonth.aspx

Meet at Harvest Food Court at 9:00am!

Sign up for the 10am lesson!

Ragged Mountain Resort

http://www.raggedmountainresort.com/

 

If you need to reach me:

Tran: 781.484.7913
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Harvest Food Court at 9:00am!

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Ski/Snowboarding at Ragged Mountain Resort
